mapper.insert: insert into item (name, size, color, price, content, stock_quantity, picture, category) values (#{name}, #{size}, #{color}, #{price}, #{content}, #{stockQuantity}, #{picture}, #{category})
mapper.select: select item_id as id, category, name, size, color, price, content, stock_quantity as stockQuantity, picture from item order by item_id desc limit 4
